positions.comment: Still moored in Venice - Love it here - staying another few days
Still moored in Venice - Love it here - staying another few days
Left Venice on our way to Croatia
moored in channel between Ilovik and Sv. Petar, Croatia - beautiful, but crowded
moored in channel between Ist and Molat, Croatia - beautiful, clear water
anchored in Utra, otok Molat, Croatia - beautiful, hot
Luka Telascia, Croatia, beautiful, Edward VIII and Wallace Simpson honeymooned here
Kakan Island, Croatia - survived storm - another beautiful anchorage in paradise
Anchored - Rogoznica - rough sail, rough night at anchor - the Bora blows!
Moored in Palmizana on St. Klement, Croatia
Moored in Korcula, Croatia - beautiful medieval village
No room at Bari, heading for Brindisi
